title: Charming Kitten APT Tries Spying on Israeli Cybersecurity Experts
summary: Charming Kitten APT Tries Spying on Israeli Cybersecurity Experts. Israel's cyber pros are having to put theory into practice, as a notorious nation-state APT sponsored by Iran targets them with spear-phishing attacks....
content: Israel's cyber pros are having to put theory into practice, as a notorious nation-state APT sponsored by Iran targets them with spear-phishing attacks.
